items.name: Barbed Wire
items.description: Touching enemies deals 50% damage/sec.
items.stack: +20% larger radius, +17% damage/sec. Deminishing returns on damage/sec increase.

items.name: Bitter Root
items.description: Gain 8% max HP.
items.stack: Further gain 8% max HP, up to 38 stacks (300% extra HP).
items.unlock: Reach 650 health.

items.name: Bundle of Fireworks
items.description: Upon opening/activating an object, fire 8 fireworks that deal 300% damage.

items.name: Bustling Fungus
items.description: After 2 seconds, heal for 4.5% of your health every second.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: On Hit: Deal +50% damage to enemies above 80% health.

items.name: Fire Shield
items.description: After being hit for 10% of your maximum health in one hit: explode, dealing 400% damage and knocking back enemies.
items.stack: Increases explosion damage by 200%, and increases knockback by 20%.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: Heal for 10 health after 1.1 seconds of getting hit.
items.stack: Each additional First Aid Kit increases the heal by 10.

items.name: Gasoline
items.description: On kill: Killing enemies burns the ground for 60% damage for 2 seconds.

items.name: Headstompers
items.description: Hurt enemies by falling for up to 507% damage.

items.name: Hermit's Scarf
items.description: 10% chance to evade attacks.
items.stack: Increases dodge chance +5%, up to a maximum of 35% at 6 stacks.
items.unlock: Huntress: Achieve 200% attack speed.

items.name: Lens Maker's Glasses
items.description: On Hit: your attacks have a 7% chance to critically strike, dealing double damage.
items.stack: +7% crit chance. 100% chance to crit on 14 stacks.

items.name: Life Savings
items.description: Generate $1 every 3 seconds.

items.name: Meat Nugget
items.description: On Hit: 8% chance to drop 2 meat nuggets that heals for 2x6 health.

items.name: Monster Tooth
items.description: On kill: Killing an enemy heals you for 10 health.

items.name: Mortar Tube
items.description: On Hit: 9% chance to fire a mortar for 170% damage

items.name: Mysterious Vial
items.description: Increase health regeneration by 1.2 per second.

items.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
items.description: +20% movement speed.
items.stack: Further increases movement speed by 20%, caps at around 25.
items.unlock: Fail a shrine 3 times in a row.

items.name: Rusty Blade
items.description: On Hit: 15% chance to bleed an enemy for 4x35% damage.
items.stack: 15% extra chance to bleed, 100% chance at 7 stacks.

items.name: Snake Eyes
items.description: Failing a shrine increases crit chance by 5%.
items.stack: Further increases crit chance by 3% for each shrine fail.
items.unlock: Pass a shrine 4 times in a row.

items.name: Soldier's Syringe
items.description: Increases attack speed by 15%.
items.stack: adds another 15% increase up to 13 times, maxing at +195%
items.unlock: Commando: Dodge 7 lethal attacks.

items.name: Spikestrip
items.description: When hit, drops spikestrips (lasts for 2 seconds) that slow enemies by 20%
items.stack: Increases the duration of spikestrips by 1 second per stack.
items.unlock: Enforcer: Block 2000 damage total with your shield.

items.name: Sprouting Egg
items.description: After not being hit for 7 seconds, increase health regen by 2.4 health per second.
items.stack: +2.4 heath per second out of combat.

items.name: Sticky Bomb
items.description: On Hit: 8% chance to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 140% damage.
items.unlock: Engineer: Detonate 15 "Bounding Mines" within 5 seconds.

items.name: Taser
items.description: On Hit: 7% chance to snare enemies for 1.5 seconds.
items.unlock: Loader: Travel for 20,000 feet using the Hydraulic Gauntlet.

items.name: Warbanner
items.description: On level up drop a banner. Raise attack/move speed by 30% and damage by 4.
items.stack: Area of effect increased by 40% of base size.

items.name: 56 Leaf Clover
items.description: Elite mobs have a 4% chance to drop items.
items.stack: +1.5% item drop chance, up to a maximum of 100% at 65 stacks.
items.unlock: Kill the Scavenger.

items.name: Arms Race
items.description: On drone action: 9% chance for drones to fire missiles and mortars.
items.stack: +10% chance to fire missles, +170% more mortar damage
items.unlock: HAN-D: Kill 10 enemies with FORCED-REASSEMBLY simultaneously.

items.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
items.description: On Hit: 10% chance of firing a missile that deals 300% damage.

items.name: Boxing Gloves
items.description: On Hit: hitting enemies have a 15% chance to knock them back.

items.name: Chargefield Generator
items.description: On kill: generate a lightning ring, dealing 100% damage/sec for 6 seconds. Subsequent kills will expland the ring.
items.unlock: Mercenary: Eviscerate 50 enemies.

items.name: Concussion Grenade
items.description: On Hit: 6% chance to stun enemies for two seconds.
items.unlock: Engineer: Kill a Boss in 15 seconds or less.

items.name: Dead Man's Foot
items.description: Drop a poison mine at low health for 4x150% damage.
items.unlock: Find the Bloated Survivor.

items.name: Energy Cell
items.description: Increased attack speed by up to 40% based on how much HP you have lost.
items.stack: +20% increased maximum attack speed, caps at 90% increase with 4 cells.

items.name: Filial Imprinting
items.description: Hatch a creature who drops attack speed/health regen/move speed buffs every 20 seconds.
items.unlock: Drown 20 Whorls.

items.name: Frost Relic
items.description: On kill: Killing an enemy surrounds you with 3 icicles that deal 3x33% damage.

items.name: Golden Gun
items.description: Deals bonus damage per gold, up to 40% damage at 700 gold. Scales with time.
items.stack: Halves the gold required for max damage.
items.unlock: Bank 20,000 gold.

items.name: Guardian's Heart
items.description: Gain a 60 health shield. Recharges in 7 seconds.

items.name: Harvester's Scythe
items.description: On crit: heal for 8 health. Gain 5% critical chance.
items.stack: +5% critical chance and +2 health on a critical strike.
items.unlock: use a health shrine that drops you below 5% health.

items.name: Hopoo Feather
items.description: Gain another jump.

items.name: Infusion
items.description: On kill: killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1.

items.name: Leeching Seed
items.description: On Hit: Dealing damage heals you for 2 health. If the shot pierces and hits mutiple enemies, there will be diminishing returns for each subsequent enemy hit.

items.name: Panic Mines
items.description: Drop a mine at low health for 500% damage.
items.unlock: Miner: Survive the teleporter event without falling below 50% health.

items.name: Predatory Instincts
items.description: On crit: increase attack speed by 10%. Stacks up to 30%.
items.stack: +5% crit chance. Further increase 1% attack speed increment on crit strikes.
items.unlock: Huntress: Defeat the Legendary Wisp without taking damage.

items.name: Prison Shackles
items.description: On Hit: Slow enemies by 20% on every attack.

items.name: Red Whip
items.description: Leaving combat for 1.5 seconds boosts your movement speed by 80%.

items.name: Rusty Jetpack
items.description: Decrease gravity by 50% and increase jump height by 10%.

items.name: Smart Shopper
items.description: +25% enemy gold drops.

items.name: Time Keeper's Secret
items.description: Falling to low health stops time for 3 seconds.
items.stack: +1s time stop duration, up to a maximum of 10 seconds at 8 stacks.

items.name: Tough Times
items.description: Increase armor by 14.

items.name: Toxic Centipede
items.description: Infect enemies, dealing 50% damage/sec. Bounces to other enemies on death.
items.unlock: Acrid: Spread 10,000 feet of "Caustic Sludge".

items.name: Ukulele
items.description: On Hit: 20% chance to fire chain lighting for 4x33% damage.

items.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
items.description: On kill: 33% chance to create a lava pillar from the enemy's corpse for 250% damage.
items.stack: Further increases lava pillar damage by +100%.

items.name: Alien Head
items.description: Decreases your cooldowns by 25%.
items.stack: Stacks multiplicatively up to 3 times. (60% reduction).
items.unlock: Obtain 7 Monster Teeth and 1 Guardian's Heart.

items.name: Ancient Scepter
items.description: Upgrade your fourth ability; this is unique to each character class. Full list of effects here.
items.unlock: Mercenary: Beat the game on Monsoon difficulty.

items.name: AtG Missile Mk. 2
items.description: On Hit: 7% chance to fire three missiles that deal 3x300% damage.
items.stack: +7% chance to fire missiles. 100% at 15 stacks.

items.name: Beating Embryo
items.description: use items have a 30% chance to deal double the effect.
items.stack: Increases duplication chance by 30%. 100% at 4 stacks.

items.name: Brilliant Behemoth
items.description: On Hit: your projectiles explode for a bonus 20% damage to nearby enemies.

items.name: Ceremonial Dagger
items.description: On kill: fire out 4 heat-seeking bolts that deal 100% damage.

items.name: Dio's friend
items.description: Taking fatal damage revives you to 40% health. Invincible for 2 seconds.
items.stack: Can not be stacked for multiple revives, but if the revive effect has been used picking up another will reset it.
items.unlock: Die 50 times.

items.name: Fireman's Boots
items.description: Walking leaves behind a fire trail that burns for 35% damage.
items.unlock: Survive in lava for 1 minute straight.

items.name: Happiest Mask
items.description: On kill: spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 70% health and 50% damage for 15 seconds.

items.name: Heaven Cracker
items.description: Every 4 basic attacks pierce through enemies for 100% damage.
items.stack: Reduce attacks required by 1 per additional Heaven Cracker. Pierces every attack at 4 stacks.

items.name: Hyper-Threader
items.description: On Hit: Every attack fires a laser, dealing 40% damage and bouncing to 2 enemies.
items.unlock: Commando: Activate the third teleporter without being hit once.

items.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
items.description: On kill: spawn an alien plant that heals you for 8 HP.
items.unlock: CHEF: SEAR/FLAMBE 20 Sand Crabs.

items.name: Laser Turbine
items.description: All your attacks charge the generator. At full power, fire a laser for 2000% damage.
items.stack: Increases charge amount per ability use.
items.unlock: CHEF: Have 20 cleavers in the air simultaneously.

items.name: Old Box
items.description: Drop a jack-in-the-box at low health, fearing enemies for 2 seconds.

items.name: Permafrost
items.description: On Hit: Chance to stun enemies for 1.5 seconds and slow enemies by 60% for three seconds.

items.name: Photon Jetpack
items.description: Allows the player to fly for up to 1.6 seconds nonstop; the jetpack's fuel tank quickly refills when not in use.
items.unlock: End a teleporter timer with 0 enemies on the map.

items.name: Plasma Chain
items.description: On Hit: Chance to tether onto enemies dealing 60% damage per second.

items.name: Rapid Mitosis
items.description: Reduce the cooldown of use items by 25%.
items.stack: Further reduces item cooldowns by 25%, multiplicatively. Soft caps at around 30 stacks.

items.name: Repulsion Armor
items.description: After 6 hits reduce and reflect incoming damage by 83% for 3 seconds.
items.stack: Increases length of reflection by 1 second to a cap of 8 seconds.

items.name: Shattering Justice
items.description: Attacks reduce enemy armor by 5. Reduction stacks up to 25.
items.unlock: Miner: Reach level 10 without getting hurt more than once.

items.name: Telescopic Sight
items.description: On Hit: 1% chance to instantly kill an enemy.
items.stack: +0.5% proc chance up to a maximum of 3%.
items.unlock: Sniper: 1-shot kill 10 enemies consecutively.

items.name: Tesla Coil
items.description: Shock nearby enemies for 150% damage.

items.name: Thallium
items.description: On Hit: damage/slow by 500 enemy damage% and 100% speed over 3 seconds.

items.name: The Hit List
items.description: On kill: killing a marked enemy permanently increases damage by 0.5, up to a maximum of 20.
items.unlock: Bandit: Reset your cooldown 15 times consecutively.

items.name: The Ol' Lopper
items.description: 100% critical chance on enemies below 9% health.
items.stack: +4% health threshold, up to a cap of 35% health at 8 stacks
items.unlock: Survive 40 minutes.

items.name: Wicked Ring
items.description: On crit: reduce cooldowns by 1 second.
items.stack: +1s cooldown reduction on crit, +6% critical chance.
items.unlock: Collect 4 Keycards.

items.name: Burning Witness
items.description: On kill: Grants a firetrail, 5% movement speed, and 1 damage for 6 seconds.

items.name: Colossal Knurl
items.description: Increase health by 40, health regeneration by 1.2/second, and armor by 6.

items.name: Ifrit's Horn
items.description: On Hit: 8% chance to incinerate enemies for 220% damage.

items.name: Imp Overlord's Tentacle
items.description: Summon an Imp bodyguard that revives every 60 seconds.
items.stack: Increase his health, damage, and speed, and change his color.

items.name: Legendary Spark
items.description: On Hit: 8% chance to smite enemies for 200% damage.

items.name: Nematocyst Nozzle
items.description: Shoot out 6 nematocysts that deal 200% damage.

items.name: Captain's Brooch
items.description: Call down a chest nearby.
items.unlock: Unlock a Golden Chest with the Skeleton Key.

items.name: Carrara Marble
items.description: Place a marble gate. Teleport back to the gate by activating again.

items.name: Crudely Drawn Buddy
items.description: Blow up a decoy, attracting enemies for 8 seconds. Looks just like you.
items.embryo: Doubles duration of decoy to 16 seconds.
items.unlock: Sniper: Achieve 20 consecutive perfect reloads

items.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
items.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles.
items.embryo: Doubles the amount of missiles to 24.

items.name: Drone Repair Kit
items.description: Repairs all drones to full health.

items.name: Dynamite Plunger
items.description: Hitting an enemy drops dynamite. Use to detonate for 400% damage.

items.name: Foreign Fruit
items.description: Heal yourself for 50% of your health.

items.name: Gigantic Amethyst
items.description: Reset all your cooldowns.
items.unlock: Loader: Kill the Overloading Magma Worm.

items.name: Glowing Meteorite
items.description: Meteors fall from the sky, damaging enemies and friends for 220% damage. Lasts 8 seconds.
items.unlock: Deal 5000 damage in one shot.

items.name: Gold-plated Bomb
items.description: use 50% of your gold to create a bomb, dealing 1 damage per gold spent.

items.name: Minefield
items.description: Drop 7 mines at your feet, each dealing 400% damage.
items.embryo: Drop 6 additional mines, for a total of 13.

items.name: Jar of Souls
items.description: Duplicate every enemy as a ghost to fight on your side.
items.embryo: Summons an additional ghost per enemy.

items.name: Lost Doll
items.description: Sacrifice 25% health to damage an enemy for 500% of your maximum health.
items.unlock: Survive a boss with less than 20% health.

items.name: Massive Leech
items.description: For 10 seconds, every hit heals you for 10 health.
items.unlock: Acrid: Spread Epidemic to 25 enemies.

items.name: Pillaged Gold
items.description: For 14 seconds, every monster will drop 1 gold on hit.
items.unlock: Bandit: Kill a boss with "Lights Out"

items.name: Prescriptions
items.description: Increase damage by 10 and attack speed by %40 for 8 seconds.
items.embryo: Doubles the attack speed increment to +80%
items.unlock: Enforcer: Stay in "Shield Mode" for 5 minutes straight (in combat).

items.name: Rotten Brain
items.description: Throw a brain that bounces in place, damaging/slowing enemies for 6x200%.

items.name: Safeguard Lantern
items.description: Drop a lantern for 10 seconds. Fears and damages enemies for 20% damage.

items.name: Sawmerang
items.description: Throw out a sawmerang for 500% damage and bleed for 4*100%.
items.embryo: Launches an identical Sawmerang behind the player.

items.name: Shattered Mirror
items.description: For 15 seconds, double all of your abilities' damage and effects.
items.embryo: Damage and effects are tripled instead.

items.name: Shield Generator
items.description: Become invincible for 8 seconds.
items.unlock: HAN-D: Stay above 70% health for 25 minutes.

items.name: Explorer's Key
items.description: Open all the chests in view.

items.name: Snowglobe
items.description: Summon a snowstorm that freezes monsters at a 30% chance over 7 seconds.
items.embryo: Doubles the duration of the snowstorm.

items.name: The Back-up
items.description: Create 4 drones to fight for you for 10 seconds.
items.unlock: Have 4 drone helpers at once.

items.name: Thqwib
items.description: Release a bloom of 30 thqwibs, detonating on impact for 200%.

items.name: Unstable Watch
items.description: Stop time for 7 seconds.
items.unlock: Complete the first stage in under 5 minutes.

items.name: Honor
items.description: Enemies always spawn as elites.
items.unlock: Found in the Desolate Forest.

items.name: Kin
items.description: Only one enemy type will spawn per stage.
items.unlock: Found in Dried Lake.

items.name: Distortion
items.description: Locks a random skill every minute, but gives you 25% cooldown reduction.
items.unlock: Found in the Damp Caverns.

items.name: Spite
items.description: Enemies release small bouncing explosives. These explosives only hurt the player.
items.unlock: Found in the Sky Meadow.

items.name: Glass
items.description: You start with 500% more damage, but have 10% of your normal HP. Upon leveling up, recieve 300% and 25% of the damage and health increase, respectively.
items.unlock: Found in the Ancient Valley.

items.name: Enigma
items.description: Enigma will replace your active item. Using enigma will trigger a random use item effect. When Enigma is active, Small Enigmas will drop instead of use items.
items.unlock: Found in the Sunken Tomb.

items.name: Sacrifice
items.description: Enemies have a chance to drop items, but chests no longer spawn. Does not share the same drop roll as 56 Leaf Clover.
items.unlock: Found in the Magma Barracks.

items.name: Command
items.description: Items are replaced with boxes that allow the player to choose the dropped item.
items.unlock: Found in the Hive Cluster.

items.name: Spirit
items.description: Run faster when at lower HP. Applies to monsters as well as the player.
items.unlock: Found in the Temple of the Elders.

items.name: Origin
items.description: Every 10 minutes, a portal materializes and summons 3 Purple imps, and 1 Imp Vanguard.
items.unlock: Defeat Providence with all other artifacts activated.

items.name: Keycard
items.description: Opens locked doors on the UES Contact Light (Final Level).
items.stack: Each key unlocks one door. (Maximum of four keys)
items.drop: Dropped by enemies or found in golden containers on the UES Contact Light (Final Level).

items.name: Small Enigma
items.description: Reduces the cooldown of use items by 5%.
items.unlock: Can be obtained when the Enigma artifact is enabled.

items.name: White Undershirt (M)
items.description: Increases armor by 3.
items.drop: Dropped by the Armored Boar on the level Boar Beach.

special items.textFlair:
ARTIFACT.
This item must be toggled on the character select screen.
